# sigscores
**sigscores** is an R package providing ready-to-use functions to compute summary scores.

The idea behind **sigscores** is to provide in a single R package different 
summary scores allowing for an easy computation and comparison of the metrics.


```{r echo=FALSE, fig.align='center', fig.cap='', out.width='75%'}
knitr::include_graphics(path = 'man/figures/sigscores.png', error = FALSE)
```

Different strategies are currently supported, including the common mean, median, 
and mode scores.

<!-- badges: end -->

## Installation

You can install latest development version from GitHub (requires [devtools](https://github.com/hadley/devtools) package):
  
  
```{r install_dev, eval=FALSE}
if (!require("devtools")) {
  install.packages("devtools")
}

devtools::install_github(
  repo = "alebarberis/sigscores", 
  dependencies = TRUE, 
  build_vignettes = FALSE
)
```


## Getting started
If you are just getting started with **sigscores**, we recommend looking at the
[Getting Started](articles/sigscores.html) section of the site.
